projects.name: Meeting Point Chat
projects.description: Meeting Point Chat is a simple and convenient chat designed for seamless communication between users. It ensures ease of use and an intuitive interface, allowing users to focus on conversations without being distracted by complex features.

projects.name: Heart and Horizon - Explore Russia's Cities
projects.description: This project provides a convenient and concise resource that helps users explore Russian cities and their attractions. Its goal is to create a comprehensive overview of each city by combining historical data, interesting facts, and visual materials.

projects.name: LicruaMarket
projects.description: LicruaMarket is an innovative online service related to food products. It is currently in active development, but you can already see the foundation of its future functionality. Features implemented include Firebase authentication and a main page with a convenient header and footer.
